creator: McColl's
descriptionHtml:
McColl's Connect - The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners

McColl's Connect is the platform for communication within and outside your organization. It consists of timelines, news feeds and chat features similar to your private social media. All to provide you with a pleasant and familiar way of communicating with colleagues and partners.

Share new knowledge, ideas and internal achievements quickly and easily with the rest of your team, department or organization. Enrich messages with pictures, videos and emoticons. Simply keep track of new posts from your colleagues, organization and partners.

Push-notifications will make you notice new coverage immediately. Especially convenient if you do not work behind a desk.

The benefits of McColl's Connect:

- Communicate wherever you are
- Information, documents and knowledge anytime, anywhere
- Share ideas, have discussions and share achievements
- No business email needed
- Learn from the knowledge and ideas within and outside your organization
- Save time, by reducing e-mail and quickly finding what you're looking for
- All shared messages are secured
- Important news will never be overlooked

Security & Management

McColl's Connect is 100% European and fully compliant with European privacy directives. A highly secure and climate-neutral European data center hosts our data. The data center uses the latest technologies in the field of security. However, should anything go wrong, there is a 24-hour standby engineer to solve any problems.

Feature list:

- Timeline
- Video
- Groups
- Messages
- News
- Events
- Locking and unlocking posts
- Who has read my post?
- Sharing files
- Integrations
- Notifications
descriptionShort: The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Fixed an issue with embeds of links and images in comments
- Made some stability and performance improvements
Check the About section in the app to see all the latest features!

Most new features are announced in the app itself. Go to the About section to check them!

Most new features are announced in the app itself. Go to the About section to check them!

title: McColl's Connect

creator: McColl's
descriptionHtml:
McColl's Connect - The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners

McColl's Connect is the platform for communication within and outside your organization. It consists of timelines, news feeds and chat features similar to your private social media. All to provide you with a pleasant and familiar way of communicating with colleagues and partners.

Share new knowledge, ideas and internal achievements quickly and easily with the rest of your team, department or organization. Enrich messages with pictures, videos and emoticons. Simply keep track of new posts from your colleagues, organization and partners.

Push-notifications will make you notice new coverage immediately. Especially convenient if you do not work behind a desk.

The benefits of McColl's Connect:

- Communicate wherever you are
- Information, documents and knowledge anytime, anywhere
- Share ideas, have discussions and share achievements
- No business email needed
- Learn from the knowledge and ideas within and outside your organization
- Save time, by reducing e-mail and quickly finding what you're looking for
- All shared messages are secured
- Important news will never be overlooked

Security & Management

McColl's Connect is 100% European and fully compliant with European privacy directives. A highly secure and climate-neutral European data center hosts our data. The data center uses the latest technologies in the field of security. However, should anything go wrong, there is a 24-hour standby engineer to solve any problems.

Feature list:

- Timeline
- Video
- Groups
- Messages
- News
- Events
- Locking and unlocking posts
- Who has read my post?
- Sharing files
- Integrations
- Notifications
descriptionShort: The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improvements:
- Fix issue where LD members are not able to post to LD timeline, when BU permissions are disabled.
- Fix issue in selecting participants in chat.
- Fix issue with country codes in adding internal phone numbers.
- Improve aspect ratio in adding and displaying news item banner.

Improvements in the Task Management premium feature:
- Enable scrolling in sort and filter options screen.


Most new features are announced in the app itself. Check them in About!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improvements:
- Fix issue where app does not display all images that are attached to a post/news inside the details screen.

Improvements in the Task Management premium feature:
- Task create/edit/delete actions are now behind permissions.
- Task list screen now shows all tasks in a single list.
- Add new "Assigned by me" filter.
- Improve spacing of task list items.
- Improve UX of date & time picker in creating a task.

Most new features are announced in the app itself. Check them in About!
